title: Start
body:
<<moveLeft Barrel1 20 60>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Bartender: You can't be old enough to drink! What are you doing here?
<<moveToX Renata Chair 0 60>>
<<moveToY Renata Chair 15 60>>
[[Can I have some juice? |juice]]
[[Can I have some food? |food]]
[[Can I have some beer? |beer]]

title: juice
body:
<<attachTo Chair Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 30 30>>
Bartender: Fresh out of juice. Can't you find somewhere else to get juice than a bar?
[[startmoving]]

title: food
body:
<<attachTo Chair Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 30 30>>
Bartender: We don't have food here. I think Javy's might have food. That's their kinda vibe. Hipster nonsense.
[[startmoving]]

title: beer
body:
<<attachTo Chair Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 30 30>>
Bartender: No! I just told you you're not old enough to drink!
[[startmoving]]

title: startmoving
body:
<<moveUp Renata 15 40>>
Mia: Ok, um....
<<moveUp Renata 15 40>>
<<detachFrom Chair Renata>>
<<animationFrame Chair chair 4>>
<<moveDown Renata 1 60>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveUp Renata 5 100>>
<<moveDown Renata 5 100>>
<<moveLeft Bartender 1 10>>
<<moveRight Bartender 1 10>>
<<moveUp Bartender 1 10>>
Bartender: What was that?
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 15 60>>
<<moveDown Renata 15 60>>
<<moveRight Renata 1 30>>
<<attachTo Chair Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
[[How's...business? |business]]
[[Nice day, huh? |weather]]
[[What's your favorite...color? |color]]

title: business
body:
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
Bartender: My business is my business. What's it to you? What is this, an investigation?
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 60>>
<<moveUp Renata 100 120>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
Mia: Uh, thank you!

title: weather
body:
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
Bartender: Uh, yeah, pretty good. It gets butts in seats, and then it's raining money!
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 60>>
<<moveUp Renata 100 120>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
Mia: Uh, thank you!

title: color
body:
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
Bartender: Green. Color of money. Now scram! I don't have anything I can sell you.
<<moveLeft Renata 20 20>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 60>>
<<moveUp Renata 100 120>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.3>>
<<faceDown Mia>>
Mia: Uh, thank you!
